specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Natural > Plant > Linen Linen fabric is made from natural materials, so it may have small bumps (slubs) in it. It is also important to keep linen fabric dry, because it can shrink or become misshapen if it gets wet. Store linen fabric in a cool, dry place where it can get plenty of air.
